definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[נ]] 2Ch 13:15, Is 19:22 ([[וְ]] consec.); sf. [[נְגׇפוֹ]] 2Ch 21:18, etc.; Impf. [[יִגּׁף]] Ex 21:35 + 2 t.; [[וַיִּגּׁף]] Ex 32:35 + 4 t.; [[אֶגּוֹף]] Ps 89:24 +, etc.; Inf. abs. [[נׇנׁף]] Is 19:22; cstr. [[לִנְגּׁף]] Ex 12:23, Ex 12:23; [[נׇגְפוֹ]] v:Ex 12:27; —strike, smite, of serious (even fatal) injury, cf. acc. pers. Ex 21:22, Ex 21:35 (E); one's foot against ([[בְּ]]) stone Ps 91:12; abs. (stumble) Pr 3:23; esp. of judgment, subj. ´[[י]], obj. individ. (fatal stroke) 1Sa 25:38, 1Sa 26:10, 2Sa 12:15, 2Ch 13:20, 2Ch 21:18 ([[לָחֳלִי]]); obj. people (abs.) Ex 12:23, Ex 12:23, Ex 12:27 (JE), Ex 32:35, Jos 24:5 (E), Is 19:22, cf. v:Is 19:22; v. also Ps 89:24; cf. c. acc. of cogn. [[מַגֵּפָה]] Zec 14:12, Zec 14:18, 2Ch 21:14 (sq. also [[בְּעַמְְּ]]); c. [[בְּ]] instr. Ex 7:27; of causing defeat in battle, cf. acc. + [[לִפְנֵי]] Ju Jdg 20:35, 1Sa 4:3, 2Ch 13:15, 2Ch 14:11.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְנַגְּפוּ]] Je 13:16 = stumble, subj. [[רַגְלֵיכֶם]], sq. [[על]] (loc.); cf.
